title: Marketplace Roundtable #37: Marine Money Pt. 2 With J Mintzmyer
description: We continue our three-part miniseries covering Marine Money with J Mintzmyer of Value Investor's Edge. I spoke with J on Tuesday morning, before day 2 of the conference, to hear what the mood is on the floor and what the response was to the first panel he joined. He also shares insights from investor and management meetings, and a few positive stories on corporate governance and improving rate stories.
itunes:title: Marine Money Pt. 2 With J Mintzmyer
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: Mintzmyer fills us in on the mood on the floor at Marine Money and the investor base turnover needed in the industry
